document_data.name: Aeron Morieth
document_data.History:
In [[1367 DR]], Aeron Morieth became the Stormwalker of [[Maerchwood]].

After the destruction of [[Cimbar]]'s College of Wizardry in [[1370 DR]], Aeron managed to depose the ruling [[Sceptanar]] of [[Chessenta]] and assumed the title. However, Aeron only held this post for a few months before handing it to [[Melisanda]] of [[Arrabar]] before moving to the Maerchwood.

By [[1372 DR]] he had attracted the attention of [[Shar]], who expressly forbade her devotees from approaching him in any way, although they were to maintain their surveillance.
